"The policy of quotas to admission in teaching career in federal universities is based in several acts, including the Law n. 12,990 / 2014, the Law of Guidelines and Bases of National Education and the Statute of Racial Equality. A documental and bibliographic’s study, this work aims discuss the relevance of the quota system, from an interdisciplinary analysis of the social function of the university. A política de cotas para ingresso na carreira docente em universidades federais se fundamenta em diversos diplomas legais, como a Lei n. 12.990/2014, a Lei de Diretrizes e Bases da Educação Nacional e no Estatuto da Igualdade Racial.
